comments.body:
But this one is public!

If you need help with anything else, you can:

• search for help in the apprenticeship service at any time (https://help.apprenticeships.education.gov.uk/hc/en-gb)
 • call us on 0800 0150 600 (option 1 then option 2)
 • email us on helpdesk@manage-apprenticeships.service.gov.uk

We are open from 8am to 8pm, Monday to Friday.

Kind regards,

Ben Arnold

Apprenticeship service support

Help us to improve our service. Take our quick survey:

https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/r/AppServiceSupport

To find out how our data is processed and your rights, view the ESFA privacy policy (https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/esfa-privacy-notice).
